user_assist.summary: Follow-up session documenting significant worsening of depressive symptoms, including passive suicidal ideation, resulting in the upward titration of Sertraline.
user_assist.reasoning: The patient reports classic symptoms of severe, escalating depression (terminal insomnia, anhedonia, weight loss) despite being on 50mg of Sertraline for 4 weeks. Safety screening confirms passive death ideation only. The focus of the session is medication management (increasing Sertraline to 100mg) and brief behavioral activation.
